abstract: Eve M Kahn Antiques column; Yale Center for British Art opens show on 18th-century British painter Johan Zoffany; Middlebury College Museum of Art features exhibit of archaeology illustrations by painter M Louise Baker; David Jackson book Mirror of the Buddha: Early Portraits From Tibet and exhibit at the Rubin Museum of Art explore early Tibetan art.
snippet: At Yale, an exhibition of Johan Zoffany’s works; unearthing the diaries of the archaeological illustrator M. Louise Baker; and tracking Tibetan art.
lead_paragraph: At Yale, an exhibition of Johan Zoffany’s works; unearthing the diaries of the archaeological illustrator M. Louise Baker; and tracking Tibetan art.

headline.main: Johan Zoffany, Portraitist; Diaries of M. Louise Baker
headline.seo: Johan Zoffany, Portraitist; Diaries of M. Louise Baker
